00020 #include <memory.h>
00021 #ifdef _WIN32
00022 #   include <winsock2.h>
00023 #else
00024 #   include <arpa/inet.h>
00025 #endif
00026 
00027 #include "IpPacket.h"
00028 
00029 const unsigned int IpPacket::MAX_PAYLOAD_SIZE = 1024;
00030 const unsigned int IpPacket::MAX_PACKET_SIZE = IpPacket::MAX_PAYLOAD_SIZE + sizeof(IpPacket::ip_header);
00031 
00032 IpPacket::IpPacket(const char* rawPacket, const unsigned int size)
00033 {
00034         m_buffer = new char[size];
00035         memcpy(m_buffer, rawPacket, size);
00036         m_ip_packet = (ip_packet *)m_buffer;
00037 
00038         m_size = size;
00039         m_payloadSize = ntohs(m_ip_packet->header.total_length) - (m_ip_packet->header.h_len * 4);
00040 }
